version_description:
• You can now record videos and read the Teleprompter
• Various interface updates and improvements
• Added a countdown timer option before scrolling begins
• Added the option to use Sign in with Apple
• Added extra camera and resolution options for video recording
• Added a demo of the External Display Mode feature
• New improvements for trackpad and mouse support on iPadOS 13.4
• Fixed an issue related to opening a support ticket

• Fixed a scrolling issue while editing text on iOS 14
• Smoother teleprompter scrolling on devices with a ProMotion display
• Added option to change if dragging your script will stop the scrolling
• Added an option to increase the maximum scroll speed
• Added the option to display clocks for elapsed and remaining time based on your scroll speed.
• Improved the color picker
• Improved font picker
• Improved scrolling when using Paging scroll mode
• Adjusted the Teleprompter UI on smaller devices
• Background fixes and updates

• New: Record audio using a connected Bluetooth microphone
• Improved PDF compatibility for larger files
• Improved the font picker
• Fixed a crashing issue related to recording video
• Updated the elapsed time clock for recording video
• Clearer indication of when video is recording
• Smoother teleprompter scrolling on devices with a ProMotion display
• Added option to change if dragging your script will stop the scrolling
• Added an option to increase the maximum scroll speed
• Added the option to display clocks for elapsed and remaining time based on your scroll speed
• Improved the color picker
• Background fixes and updates
